content.query:
use FnO
go

create view raw.vw_dMainAccount as 
  select m.RecId as [Key]
	      ,m.MainAccountId as MainAccount
	      ,m.Name
	      ,l.Name as ChartOfAccountName
    from raw.MainAccount m
         inner join raw.LedgerChartOfAccounts l on l.RecId = m.LedgerChartOfAccounts
go

/*
-- Need to delete the storage in data lake
drop external table dw.dMainAccount
go
*/

create external table dw.dMainAccount with (
    location = 'DataWarehouse/dMainAccount'
   ,data_source = ParquetDataSource
   ,file_format = ParquetFileFormat
) as 
    select * from raw.vw_dMainAccount
go

/* Testing
select * from raw.MainAccount
select * from raw.LedgerChartOfAccounts
select * from raw.vw_dMainAccount where ChartOfAccountName = 'Shared'
select * from dw.dMainAccount where ChartOfAccountName = 'Shared'
select count(*) from dw.dMainAccount
select count(*) from dw.dMainAccount where ChartOfAccountName = 'Shared'
*/
